customers-list works!

Name Customer Number
{{ customer.Name }} {{ customer.CustomerNumber }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-customers-list', templateUrl: './customers-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./customers-list.component.css'] }) export class CustomersListComponent implements OnInit { customers: any[] = []; loading = false; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } async ngOnInit() { this.loading = true; try { const data = await this.http.get('https://localhost:7245/Customers/').toPromise(); this.customers = data ? data : []; } catch (error) { console.error(error); } finally { this.loading = false; } } }
